original_text: The four wheels all looked the same. They shone like bright jewels. The wheels were made like this: Each wheel had another wheel that went across the middle of it.
korean_text: 그 바퀴의 모양과 그 구조는 황옥 같이 보이는데 그 넷은 똑같은 모양을 가지고 있으며 그들의 모양과 구조는 바퀴 안에 바퀴가 있는 것 같으며

sentences.original_text: The four wheels all looked the same
The wheels were made like this
that went across the middle of it
